info.name: benching log2 vs IEEEexponent
info.description:
as expected:
- optimizer don't know that floor(log2) is just reading the IEEE exponent
- anyway doing it manually is costlier than the FPU

Odd:
- log2 is still costlier than floor(log2) or log2(floor)
- float(a+b) is alot costler than float(a)-float(b)
